title: How’s this for a lucky St. Patrick’s Day? Finish a puzzle and win $2 million!
content:
Macworld

Rather than depending on a tricky leprechaun or an iffy rainbow to lead you to a pot of gold, we’ve got a more practical approach to scoring newfound wealth: just complete a 500-piece puzzle – and you could be in line for a $1 million payday.

The 2 Million Dollar Puzzle by MSCHF delivers all the fun and mind-expanding benefits of doing a standard jigsaw puzzle. But unlike other puzzles, this one could make you rich. But you’re gonna have to put in the work, of course. The image on the puzzle presents a challenge as all those squiggly lines and strange color combinations ultimately form a big QR code. But while the challenge is usually its own reward, this puzzle’s reward becomes real once you’re finished.

Just pull out your smartphone, scan the QR code and instantly discover your prize. Every puzzle yields a reward, which could turn out to be just $1, $100, $1,000 or it could even be one of two puzzles worth $1 million. 

With this special St. Patrick’s Day offer, you can get The 2 Million Dollar Puzzle for almost half off, a $30 value on sale for only $17.77. While that’s a great deal, you can save even more by buying a 7-pack of puzzles for only $77.77. You can pass them out to friends like a clever version of a lottery ticket…or do all 7 puzzles yourself and max out your shot at that $1 million prize.
